item.title: Subdomain Takeover: how an atacker can take control of your website
item.description: Computer attacks are increasingly sophisticated and, in many cases, they can go unnoticed for a long time. One of these types of attacks is subdomain takeover, in which an attacker can take control of a subdomain of a website and use it for its own malicious purposes.
